00042     const char *Protocol::ms_command_strings[COMMAND_MAX] = {
00043       "open",
00044       "create",
00045       "close",
00046       "read",
00047       "append",
00048       "seek",
00049       "remove",

00066     CommBuf *Protocol::create_open_request(const String &fname, uint32_t bufsz) {
00067       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER);
00068       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 6 + Serialization::encoded_length_str16(fname));
00069       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_OPEN);
00070       cbuf->append_i32(bufsz);
00071       cbuf->append_str16(fname);
00072       return cbuf;
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00078     CommBuf *Protocol::create_create_request(const String &fname, bool overwrite, int32_t bufsz,
00079                                            int32_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00080       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER);
00081       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 20 + Serialization::encoded_length_str16(fname));
00082       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_CREATE);
00083       cbuf->append_i16((overwrite) ? 1 : 0);
00084       cbuf->append_i32(replication);
00085       cbuf->append_i32(bufsz);
00086       cbuf->append_i64(blksz);
00087       cbuf->append_str16(fname);
00088       return cbuf;
00089     }
00090

00094     CommBuf *Protocol::create_close_request(int32_t fd) {
00095       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER, fd);
00096       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 6);
00097       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_CLOSE);
00098       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00099       return cbuf;
00100     }

00104     CommBuf *Protocol::create_read_request(int32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00105       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER, fd);
00106       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10);
00107       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_READ);
00108       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00109       cbuf->append_i32(amount);
00110       return cbuf;
00111     }

00114     CommBuf *Protocol::create_append_request(int32_t fd, StaticBuffer &buffer,
00115                                              bool flush) {
00116       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER, fd);
00117       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 11, buffer);
00118       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_APPEND);
00119       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00120       cbuf->append_i32(buffer.size);
00121       cbuf->append_bool(flush);
00122       return cbuf;
00123     }

00127       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER, fd);
00128       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 14);
00129       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_SEEK);
00130       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00131       cbuf->append_i64(offset);
00132       return cbuf;
00133     }

00137     CommBuf *Protocol::create_remove_request(const String &fname) {
00138       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER);
00139       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + Serialization::encoded_length_str16(fname));
00140       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_REMOVE);

00142       return cbuf;

00159     CommBuf *Protocol::create_position_read_request(int32_t fd, uint64_t offset, uint32_t amount) {
00160       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER, fd);
00161       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 18);
00162       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_PREAD);
00163       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00164       cbuf->append_i64(offset);
00165       cbuf->append_i32(amount);
00166       return cbuf;
00167     }

00212     CommBuf *Protocol::create_shutdown_request(uint16_t flags) {
00213       HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER);
00214       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 4);
00215       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_SHUTDOWN);
00216       cbuf->append_i16(flags);
00217       return cbuf;

00243     CommBuf *
00244     Protocol::create_rename_request(const String &src, const String &dst) {
00245       HeaderBuilder hb(Header::PROTOCOL_DFSBROKER);
00246       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hb, 2 + encoded_length_str16(src) +
00247                                   encoded_length_str16(dst));
00248       cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_RENAME);
00249       cbuf->append_str16(src);
00250       cbuf->append_str16(dst);
00251       return cbuf;
00252     }
00253 
00254 
00255     const char *Protocol::command_text(short command) {
00256       if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00257         return "UNKNOWN";
00258       return ms_command_strings[command];
00259     }
